src:
Children told to ‘build the wall’ at White House Halloween party
04 Nov 2019, 15:55 by Yahoo News Video
A Halloween party on Oct. 25 at the Eisenhower Executive Office Building featured candy, paper
airplanes, and a station where children were encouraged to help “Build the Wall”} with their own
personalized bricks.
